name: Zhengxin Chen
content: Zhengxin Chen | College of Information Science & Technology | University of Nebraska Omaha Zhengxin Chen Zhengxin Chen, Ph.D. Professor Emeritus Computer Science email: zchen@unomaha.edu office: PKI 281 C office phone: 402.554.3625 fax: 402.554.3400 personal website: https://faculty.ist.unomaha.edu/chen/ note: This profile is pulling in data from Digital Measures. Postings on personal websites or social media do not indicate that the individual is speaking on behalf of UNO. General Information General Information Teaching Interests Advanced Artificial IntelligenceExpert SystemsAdvanced Topics of Database Management SystemsDatabase Management Systems (II)Data Warehousing and Data MiningInformation Retrieval Research Interests Various issues in Artificial intelligence Database management systemsIntelligent information retrieval, and others Recent interest also includes database search and data mining in bioinformatics.
